title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 6-2.7 - Requests for records and information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 6-2.7 - Requests for records and information

State Regulations

All requests made pursuant to this Subpart shall be made
in writing and must be accompanied by a reasonable proof of
identity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
6-2.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
